issue.message: The Compose Compiler cannot infer the stability of a parameter if a List<String> is used in it, even if the item type is stable. You should use Kotlinx Immutable Collections instead: `tags: ImmutableList<String>` or create an `@Immutable` wrapper for this class: `@Immutable data class TagsList(val items: List<String>)` See https://slackhq.github.io/compose-lints/rules/#avoid-using-unstable-collections for more information.
